name: Kobold Breath
summary: You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy.
description:
You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy that manifests as a 30-foot line or a 15-foot cone, dealing 1d4 damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. You can't use this ability again for 1d4 rounds.

 At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4. The shape of the breath, the damage type, and the saving throw match those of your draconic exemplar (see Table 1â€“1). This ability has the trait associated with the type of damage it deals.Table 1-1: Draconic Exemplars
